name: Andrew J. Stewart
content: Andrew Stewart - Research Explorer The University of Manchester Andrew Stewart Professor Professor of Cognitive Science, Department of Computer ScienceHead of Department (Computer Science), Computer Science - Administration https://orcid.org/0000-0002-9795-4104 Personal profile Research interestsI am a Cognitive Scientist at The University of Manchester interested in data visualisation, language, open science, and reproducible research.
